alert.note: Alert for Central Tularosa Basin; Sierra County Lakes (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 6:17PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Sierra County through 700 PM MDT... At 617 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles north of Northrup Landing. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salinas Peak. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Tularosa Basin; Sierra County Lakes
